aircraft.value: Mantis Recon - AC-8656-209 at Central Command Hub

defect_observed.value: Battery thermal runaway indication. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Lighting System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 07/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 09/04/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 08/04/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 13/04/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 17/04/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Battery thermal runaway indication. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Lighting System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
